name: Granite.OptOutUtil
doc:
A tool to determine whether any opt-out cookie is set and whether a given cookie name
is white-li...

methods.name: OptOutUtil.getCookieNames
methods.doc: <static> Returns the array of configured cookie names representing opt-out cookies.

methods.name: OptOutUtil.getWhitelistCookieNames
methods.doc: <static> Returns the array of configured cookie names representing white-listed cookies.
